work.occupation: Adventurer, formerly a STRIKE operative, fashion model
work.base: Xavier Institute, Salem Center, Westchester County, New York formerly Braddock Manor, United Kingdom; Australian Outback

connections.groupAffiliation: X-Men, formerly agent of S.T.R.I.K.E., ally of R.C.X., partner of Captain U.K.
connections.relatives: John Braddock (ancestor, possibly grandfather); Sir James Braddock (father, deceased); Lady Elizabeth Braddock (mother, deceased); Brian Braddock (Captain Britain) (twin brother); Jamie Braddock (brother, deceased); Meggan Braddock (sister-in-law);
